providing an immediately valid rectangle for sizing/positioning
of sub-views or layers. Using autolayout constraints on sub-views

Is this guide a “master guide”?
A master guide is one that is added directly to a view
and does not have a super guide. Other guides are added
to the master guide via addSubGuide (even though technically
they still have the same owning view).
